sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"劝说，劝导，劝诱"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: induce, persuade, urge, convince, counsel, coax
means: induce ： 指用讲道理来使某人做某事。
persuade ： 普通用词，指通过劝说、感情交流等而使对方做劝说者所希望的事。
urge ： 语气强，指不断地热情地规劝诱导。
convince ： 指凭行动、事实或言语使他人从思想感情上信服。
counsel ： 较正式用词，指对一些较重大事情所提出的劝告。有时也用于非正式场合，但仍强调严肃的一面。
coax ： 指用好话善意或耐心劝诱、哄骗某人做某事。

sentence.Network_en: He was delighted to coax the monoplane to 330 m.p.h.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架单翼飞机在他的摆弄下时速达到了每小时330英里，他感到很高兴。

sentence.Network_en: It took Louis until Easter to coax a grudging consent from the French King.
sentence.Network_cn: 路易斯连哄带骗，直到复活节才勉强得到法国国王的许可。

sentence.Network_en: The WPC talked yesterday of her role in trying to coax vital information from the young victim.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天，这名女警谈到自己在诱导年轻的受害人说出重要信息的过程中所起的作用。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 微雪 - 博客园 ... unintended： 无意识的，意外的 coax： 哄骗，劝诱 saturated： 饱和的，渗透的.
专业音频术语中英文对照 ... Coarse 粗调 Coax 同轴电缆 Coaxial 数码同轴界面.

关于CABLE行业的英语术语-电线电缆网DXDLW ... Direction 方向 Coax 同轴 Migration 移动性.

list.abs: This is the perfect transceiver for thin coax environments ., 这是细缆环境下最好的收发器.
the bidirectional hybrid fibre coax ( HFC ) net is a good method for the traditional CATV broadcasting to carry out the bidirection .双向同轴光纤混合(HFC)网络是传统有线电视广播走向双向化的一种很好的实现方式。
I coaxed my child to sleep ., 我哄小孩睡觉.
I coaxed the canary into the cage ., 我巧妙地使金丝雀进入笼子里.
coauthor 合著者coax plug 同轴插头coax signal cable 同轴信号电缆

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete cokes 'simpleton', of unknown origin. The original sense was 'pet, fondle', hence 'persuade by caresses or flattery', the underlying sense being 'make a simpleton of'

encyclopedia.content: coax是一个英语单词，它是一个动词。 中文意思是： 1、劝 2、诱 3、哄 4、用巧言诱哄 5、COAX=Coaxial Cable 同轴电缆 在电路中引申为同轴电缆T型端口 coax也是一个名词，意为同轴，例如 hybrid fiber coax 混合同轴纤维 德国COAX阀 德国CO-AX公司成立于1960年，以生产同轴阀著称，凭借丰富的经验，可靠而经过严格测试的材质，过硬的质量管理，CO-AX的阀广泛适用于真空、气态、液态、胶状、磨粒、污染性以及侵蚀性等各种介质。与

entry.def: If you coax someone into doing something, you gently try to persuade them to do it.

example.ex: After lunch, she watched, listened and coaxed Bobby into talking about himself...
example.tran: 吃过午饭，她照看着博比，听他说话，哄他说说自己的事。

example.ex: The government coaxed them to give up their strike by promising them temporary residence permits.
example.tran: 政府承诺给他们发放暂住证，诱哄他们放弃罢工。

entry.def: If you coax something such as information out of someone, you gently persuade them to give it to you.

example.ex: The WPC talked yesterday of her role in trying to coax vital information from the young victim...
example.tran: 昨天，这名女警谈到自己在诱导年轻的受害人说出重要信息的过程中所起的作用。

example.ex: It took Louis until Easter to coax a grudging consent from the French King.
example.tran: 路易斯连哄带骗，直到复活节才勉强得到法国国王的许可。

entry.tran: 小心地摆弄(机器或装置)
entry.def: If you coax a machine or device into doing something, you make it work by operating it very slowly and gently.

example.ex: He would stride on stage then proceed to coax the sweetest possible sounds out of his violin...
example.tran: 他会大步走上舞台，然后轻轻地拉他的小提琴，奏出美妙动听的曲调。

example.ex: He was delighted to coax the monoplane to 330 m.p.h.
example.tran: 这架单翼飞机在他的摆弄下时速达到了每小时330英里，他感到很高兴。

means.word_mean: 1. a transmission line for high-frequency signals
1. influence or urge by gentle urging, caressing, or flattering;

auth_sentence.content: You coax the blues right out of my heart.
auth_sentence.res_content: You coax the blues right out of my heart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You coax the blues right out of my heart.

auth_sentence.content: There were attempts to coax him back to work.
auth_sentence.res_content: There were attempts to coax him back to work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There were attempts to coax him back to work.

auth_sentence.content: There are gentle ways to coax more people off dependency.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are gentle ways to coax more people off dependency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are gentle ways to coax more people off dependency.

sentences.en: He coaxed extra money from his father.
sentences.cn: 他用甜言蜜语骗他父亲额外给他钱。

sentences.en: She coaxed her son into going to school.

jushi.english: The nurse coaxed a smile from the baby.
He coaxed extra money from his father.
jushi.chinese: 他用甜言蜜语骗他父亲额外给他钱。

jushi.english: She coaxed her son into going to school.
